Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • muzaffar.shapes.Shape
      • muzaffar.shapes.Shape2D
        • muzaffar.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape2D
    This class represents a simple Rectangle
    Author:
    rmuzaffar862

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height, java.awt.Color fillColor, java.awt.Color strokeColor, int strokeWidth)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height,
                 java.awt.Color fillColor,
                 java.awt.Color strokeColor,
                 int strokeWidth)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height
        Parameters:
        x - x of upper left hand corner
        y - y of upper left hand corner
        width - width of upper left hand corner
        height - height of upper left hand corner

      • rotate90

        public Rectangle rotate90()
        Description copied from class: Shape2D
        Returns new Shape2D rotated on the center 90 degrees. The width and height are switched and the centerpoint remains the same.
        Specified by:
        rotate90 in class Shape2D
        Returns:
        returns new Shape2D rotated 90 degrees on center
